类 BoundedString

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.support.classes.BoundedString
所有已实现的接口:
Drawable
public class BoundedString extends Object implements Drawable
The BoundedString class represents a drawable string with a specified bounding rectangle. It allows the string to be rendered with various customization options such as font family, style, size, color, and positioning within the specified bounds. It also implements the Drawable interface.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    BoundedString()
    Constructs a new BoundedString with an empty string and a default size of 0.

    Constructs a new BoundedString with the specified string and a default size of 0.
    BoundedString(String d, int stringSize)
    Constructs a new BoundedString with the specified string and size.
    BoundedString(String d, int stringSize, double x, double y)
    Constructs a new BoundedString with the specified string, size, and position.
    BoundedString(String d, int stringSize, double x, double y, double width, double height)
    Constructs a new BoundedString with the specified string, size, position, and bounds.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • BoundedString

      public BoundedString(String d, int stringSize, double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Constructs a new BoundedString with the specified string, size, position, and bounds.
      参数:
      d - The string to be displayed.
      stringSize - The size of the string.
      x - The X-coordinate for the position of the string.
      y - The Y-coordinate for the position of the string.
      width - The width of the bounding rectangle.
      height - The height of the bounding rectangle.

    • BoundedString

      public BoundedString(String d, int stringSize, double x, double y)
      Constructs a new BoundedString with the specified string, size, and position. The bounding rectangle will have zero width and height.
      参数:
      d - The string to be displayed.
      stringSize - The size of the string.
      x - The X-coordinate for the position of the string.
      y - The Y-coordinate for the position of the string.

    • BoundedString

      public BoundedString(String d, int stringSize)
      Constructs a new BoundedString with the specified string and size. The position will be set to (0, 0) and the bounding rectangle will have zero width and height.
      参数:
      d - The string to be displayed.
      stringSize - The size of the string.

    • BoundedString

      public BoundedString(String d)
      Constructs a new BoundedString with the specified string and a default size of 0.

    • BoundedString

      public BoundedString()
      Constructs a new BoundedString with an empty string and a default size of 0.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getRenderPoint

      protected Pair<Double,Double> getRenderPoint(Graphics2D g2d, String d)
      Calculates the rendering point for the string based on the bounding rectangle and origin.
      参数:
      g2d - The Graphics2D object used for rendering.
      d - The string to be rendered.
      返回:
      A Pair containing the X and Y coordinates for the string's position.

    • render

      public void render(Graphics2D g2d)
      Renders the string within the specified bounds using the current font settings.
      指定者:
      render 在接口中 Drawable
      参数:
      g2d - The Graphics2D object used for rendering.

    • setStyle

      public void setStyle(int style)
      Sets the font style for the string.
      参数:
      style - The font style to set (e.g., Font.BOLD, Font.ITALIC).

    • setString

      public void setString(String s)
      Sets the string content to be displayed.
      参数:
      s - The string to set.

    • getString

      public String getString()
      Returns the current string content.
      返回:
      The current string.

    • setStringColor

      public void setStringColor(Color stringColor)
      Sets the color of the string.
      参数:
      stringColor - The color to set for the string.

    • setBounds

      public void setBounds(CRect c)
      Sets the bounds of the string.
      参数:
      c - The CRect representing the new bounds.

    • getBounds

      public CRect getBounds()
      Returns the current bounds of the string.
      返回:
      The CRect representing the bounds of the string.

    • setMaxStringSize

      public void setMaxStringSize(int maxStringSize)
      Sets the maximum allowed size for the string.
      参数:
      maxStringSize - The maximum string size.

    • setRelativeX

      public void setRelativeX(double x)
      Sets the relative X position for the string.
      参数:
      x - The relative X coordinate (0.0 to 1.0).

    • setRelativeY

      public void setRelativeY(double y)
      Sets the relative Y position for the string.
      参数:
      y - The relative Y coordinate (0.0 to 1.0).

    • setStringOrigin

      public void setStringOrigin(Pair<Double,Double> p)
      Sets the origin point for the string positioning.
      参数:
      p - A Pair representing the X and Y coordinates of the origin.

    • getStringColor

      public Color getStringColor()
      Returns the current color of the string.
      返回:
      The Color of the string.
